snippet: In one of the latest in a string of fashion trends that delight women but baffle their menfolk, new nail polish colors have been calling to mind pea soup, algae and ectoplasm.
abstract: Yellow and green nail polish is the latest in a string of fashion trends that delight women but baffle their menfolk, many of whom prefer to see nude nails simply buffed and shiny.
lead_paragraph: In one of the latest in a string of fashion trends that delight women but baffle their menfolk, new nail polish colors have been calling to mind pea soup, algae and ectoplasm.

headline.seo: Nail Polish in Greens and Yellows Fail to Win Fans
headline.main: For Some, ‘Bruised’ Cuts to the Quick
headline.print_headline: For Some, ‘Bruised’ Cuts to the Quick
